name: Funky Gravity
description:
Funky Gravity made as part of the MiniJam: 107: Music² https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-107-music

A fun gravity based platformer where you race against the clock and avoid obstacles.

Design, code, art & audio by Taylor Made Games

Royalty Free Music from Bensound: https://www.bensound.com/
